name: Night of the Living Snow
description:
Rescue Santa!

Save Christmas! 

You are a young vampire who helps Santa deliver presents to children on Christmas eve under cover of night. Santa has been kidnapped and you must rescue him from the evil snowmen! Explore the dark caves in search of Santa and save Christmas! 

Game trailer /Dev blog: https://clairegoh.wixsite.com/portfolio/solo-projects

Controls:

A = Move Left

D = Move Right

Space Bar = Jump

E = Throw Snowball

P = Pause / Quit

Credits:

Design, Art, Programming - Claire Langton - Goh (Devillia59) 

Audio source - Freesound.org CC0 License 

Feedback welcome!

Enjoy the game!
